intern.title: Responsive Landing Page HTML CSS
intern.desc: Design and code a landing page for a fictional product or service. Focus on making it responsive so it looks good on various devices and screen sizes. This project emphasizes responsive design principles and CSS media queries.

intern.title: E-commerce Website
intern.desc: Build a fully functional e-commerce platform with HTML for structure, CSS for styling, JavaScript for interactivity, and possibly a frontend framework like React or Vue.js for managing state and components.
